'''Thomas Robins''' is a [[New Zealand]] actor who portrayed [[Déagol]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. He also portrayed Young [[Thráin]] in ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.theonering.net/torwp/2013/09/17/79224-actor-thomas-robins-deagol-and-young-thrain-talks-to-torn/|articlename=Actor Thomas Robins (Deagol and Young Thrain) talks to TORn|dated=17 September 2013|website=TORN|accessed=18 September 2013}}</ref>
